summary: Completed testing of migrated location data from frontend mockData.js to backend MongoDB. All 12 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI tested - locations page shows all 8 locations, location detail page displays data correctly, admin can view/manage all locations in the Locations tab.
critical_code_review_comments: Location data successfully migrated from mockData.js to MongoDB
Property names correctly converted from camelCase to snake_case (online_ordering, reservation_phone)
All 8 locations have required fields: id, slug, name, address, phone, coordinates, hours
API properly excludes MongoDB _id field from responses
Admin endpoints correctly protected with JWT authentication
Frontend LocationsPage.jsx and LocationDetailPage.jsx correctly fetch from API via getLocations() and getLocationBySlug()
context_for_next_testing_agent: Location data migration complete. 8 locations in database: edgewood-atlanta, midtown-atlanta, douglasville, riverdale, valdosta, albany, stone-mountain, las-vegas. All CRUD operations working via admin API. Public endpoints return only active locations.

GET /api/locations returns 8 locations.details: Returns all 8 active locations with snake_case properties

GET /api/locations/edgewood-atlanta.details: Returns specific location with all required fields

GET /api/locations/midtown-atlanta.details: Returns specific location with hours and coordinates

snake_case property names.details: All locations use snake_case (online_ordering, reservation_phone) not camelCase

GET /api/admin/locations (with auth).details: Returns all locations including inactive ones

All locations have required fields.details: id, slug, name, address, phone, reservation_phone, coordinates, image, hours, online_ordering, reservations

Location coordinates valid.details: All lat/lng values within valid ranges

Frontend /locations page.details: Displays all 8 locations with names, addresses, phones, action buttons

Frontend /locations/{slug} page.details: Shows location name, address, map, tabs (Wall, DMs, Drinks, Tip DJ, Info)

Admin Locations tab.details: Shows all 8 locations with edit/delete buttons, Add Location button available
